The test failures have no connection with the changes.

@smolnar82 ,
Thanks for pointing out to EqualsBuilder. But given that trunk version is already merged (and I don't want to end up with 2 different implementations at 2 branches), and that there are only 2 fields under comparison, I'd prefer to merge it as is. Next time probably will fall back to using EqualsBuilder at a similar case
